22 struct RobotState {
23  using Msg = rj_msgs::msg::RobotState;
24 
25  rj_geometry::Pose pose;
26  rj_geometry::Twist velocity;
27  RJ::Time timestamp;
28  bool visible = false;

35  RobotState(const rj_geometry::Pose& pose, const rj_geometry::Twist& velocity,
36  const RJ::Time& timestamp, bool visible)
37  : pose{pose},
38  velocity{velocity},
39  timestamp{timestamp},
40  visible{visible} {}
41 };

142 struct WorldState {
143  using Msg = rj_msgs::msg::WorldState;
144 
145  WorldState() {
146  their_robots.resize(kNumShells);
147  our_robots.resize(kNumShells);
148  }
149 
153  WorldState(std::vector<RobotState> their_robots,
154  std::vector<RobotState> our_robots, const BallState& ball)
155  : their_robots{std::move(their_robots)},
156  our_robots{std::move(our_robots)},
157  ball{ball} {}
158 
159  RobotState& get_robot(bool ours, int shell) {
160  if (ours) {
161  return our_robots.at(shell);
162  } else {
163  return their_robots.at(shell);
164  }
165  }
166 
167  [[nodiscard]] RobotState get_robot(bool ours, int shell) const {
168  if (ours) {
169  return our_robots.at(shell);
170  } else {
171  return their_robots.at(shell);
172  }
173  }
174 
179  RJ::Time last_updated_time;
180 
181  std::vector<RobotState> their_robots;
182  std::vector<RobotState> our_robots;
183  BallState ball;
184 };

186 namespace rj_convert {
187 
188 template <>
189 struct RosConverter<RobotState, RobotState::Msg> {
190  static RobotState::Msg to_ros(const RobotState& value) {
191  RobotState::Msg result;
192  convert_to_ros(value.timestamp, &result.stamp);
193  convert_to_ros(value.pose, &result.pose);
194  convert_to_ros(value.velocity, &result.velocity);
195  convert_to_ros(value.visible, &result.visible);
196  return result;
197  }
198 
199  static RobotState from_ros(const RobotState::Msg& value) {
200  RobotState result;
201  result.timestamp = convert_from_ros(value.stamp);
202  convert_from_ros(value.pose, &result.pose);
203  convert_from_ros(value.velocity, &result.velocity);
204  convert_from_ros(value.visible, &result.visible);
205  return result;
206  }
207 };
208 
209 ASSOCIATE_CPP_ROS(RobotState, RobotState::Msg);
210 
211 template <>
212 struct RosConverter<BallState, BallState::Msg> {
213  static BallState::Msg to_ros(const BallState& value) {
214  BallState::Msg result;
215  convert_to_ros(value.timestamp, &result.stamp);
216  convert_to_ros(value.velocity, &result.velocity);
217  convert_to_ros(value.position, &result.position);
218  convert_to_ros(value.visible, &result.visible);
219  return result;
220  }
221 
222  static BallState from_ros(const BallState::Msg& value) {
223  BallState result;
224  convert_from_ros(value.stamp, &result.timestamp);
225  convert_from_ros(value.velocity, &result.velocity);
226  convert_from_ros(value.position, &result.position);
227  convert_to_ros(value.visible, &result.visible);
228  return result;
229  }
230 };

232 ASSOCIATE_CPP_ROS(BallState, BallState::Msg);

234 template <>
235 struct RosConverter<WorldState, WorldState::Msg> {
236  static WorldState::Msg to_ros(const WorldState& value) {
237  WorldState::Msg result;
238  convert_to_ros(value.ball, &result.ball);
239  convert_to_ros(value.our_robots, &result.our_robots);
240  convert_to_ros(value.their_robots, &result.their_robots);
241  convert_to_ros(value.last_updated_time, &result.last_update_time);
242  return result;
243  }
244 
245  static WorldState from_ros(const WorldState::Msg& value) {
246  WorldState result;
247  convert_from_ros(value.ball, &result.ball);
248  convert_from_ros(value.our_robots, &result.our_robots);
249  convert_from_ros(value.their_robots, &result.their_robots);
250  convert_from_ros(value.last_update_time, &result.last_updated_time);
251  return result;
252  }
253 };
